name: Don't Beat The Snail
description:
Main feature is YOU SWITCH YOUR ABILITIES TO KILLED ENEMY'S

The main idea was that you will get abilities even from a little snail, you randomly hit. You know: less power enemy has more impact it can do to you

But as it is almost my very first game in Unity, I managed only 1 level of this game without boss :0

Thanks Birdon for helping up with game!

If you enjoy the concept, sub to my twitter cuz I love the idea and I will definetely finish this game :0 

Twitter
